description:
A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice
within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the
target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and
the next attack roll made against this target before the end
of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical
dim light glittering on the target until then.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell
slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6
for each slot level above 1st
damage: 4d6 radiant plus 1d6 per spell level above base
